name: Umpqua Bank
description: Umpqua Bank is a regional bank headquartered in Roseburg, Oregon, offering a wide range of financial services to individuals and businesses. Established in 1953, Umpqua Bank has grown to become one of the largest community banks in the Pacific Northwest, with a mission to improve the financial well-being of its customers and the communities it serves. The bank is known for its innovative approach to banking, which includes providing personalized customer service and utilizing technology to enhance the banking experience. Umpqua offers various services including personal banking, business banking, investment services, and mortgage lending, aimed at meeting the diverse financial needs of its clients. The bank emphasizes community involvement, supporting local initiatives, and promoting sustainable practices. Umpqua Bank’s commitment to customer satisfaction and community engagement has earned it a reputation as a trusted financial partner in the region.

seo.meta_title: Umpqua Bank | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Umpqua Bank, a leading community bank in the Pacific Northwest, offering a range of personal and business banking services with a focus on customer care and community involvement.

faq.question: What services does Umpqua Bank offer?
faq.answer: Umpqua Bank offers personal banking, business banking, investment services, and mortgage lending.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Umpqua Bank?
faq.answer: Cindy W. W. Munro is the CEO of Umpqua Bank.

faq.question: Where is Umpqua Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Umpqua Bank is headquartered in Roseburg, Oregon, USA.
